titles.title: Small Business Relief Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow loans from simplified employee pension accounts of small business owners for use in the small business.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/26/2009--Introduced. Small Business Relief Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain small business owners to obtain loans, through 2011, from their simplified employee pension accounts for business purposes. Requires such loans to be repaid within two years.
